channel.title: Pages on Matin Gholami
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Matin Gholami

item.title: About this blog
item.description: If you intend to know more about me or get in touch with me, have a look at My Website I love writing, I mean I love being heard but I love writing regardless of weather my writing is being read or not. I love writing as if it were some sort of calming my unfamiliar-with-peace mind. This “personal” blog of mine is supposed to be a semi-safe place for me to write, of everything and without a clear goal to be aimed at.
